ygData.subject: Re: Selos/SoW problems
ygData.msgSnippet: Replying to Digest so sorry for the delay. ... Yes, there is issues between the client and server, but I have never noticed a permanent effect like the one you
ygData.messageBody:
Replying to Digest so sorry for the delay.

**** SNIP SNIP ****
>The point being the client/server have trouble sometimes correctly keeping
>track of what your movement speed should be. Nice if you get the perma SoW
>but it sucks arse if you get the opposite.
>==========================
>
>Tszaaz

Yes, there is issues between the client and server, but I have never noticed a
permanent effect like the one you mention from Selos. As mentioned in my last
post. I can time it so when I restart Selos right after Ive zoned I will only
get the "your feet slow down" message from previus zone and never a new "You
feet move faster", but when I just restart Selo everything is ok again. Enough
from me on this issue..

Musiker, Bertox
